headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get 3X Rewards on Auto Shop Client Jobs and Robbery Contract Finales
content:
This week, modifying and delivering vehicles in Auto Shop Client Jobs will pay out 3X the usual GTA$ and RP.

Additionally, scope out the Job Board outside your Auto Shop’s office to peruse Robbery Contracts — and receive 3X GTA$ and RP for completing Robbery Contract Finales.
